header.div: IELTS Writing Task 1 You should spend about 20 minutes on this task. You should write at least 150 words.

p.b: You have seen an advertisement for a course at your local college. You would like further information.

Write a letter to the college explaining why you are interested in the course. Find out about the content of the course and the entry requirements. Ask them to send you a prospectus and an application form.

div.p: You do NOT need to write your own address.
